vulnerable.commit_message:
netfilter: nf_tables: disallow binding to already bound chain

Update nft_data_init() to report EINVAL if chain is already bound.

Fixes: d0e2c7de92c7 ("netfilter: nf_tables: add NFT_CHAIN_BINDING")
Reported-by: Gwangun Jung <exsociety@gmail.com>
Signed-off-by: Pablo Neira Ayuso <pablo@netfilter.org>
vulnerable.cve_desc: An issue was discovered in net/netfilter/nf_tables_api.c in the Linux kernel before 5.19.6. A denial of service can occur upon binding to an already bound chain.
